name: Casino Nights
description:
Welcome to Casino Nights! Take a look at the other side of the game table and play as the dealer, frantically running from game to game to keep up with all the patron's needs!

Walk up to a table and follow the instructions on the bottom. Don't leave your patrons waiting too long or they'll storm off! Lose three customers and it's game over!

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Interact with table

Music was retrieved from https://freemusicarchive.org/genre/piano

Woke up This Morning - RocknRoll (ID 1672)
by Lobo Loco

Noite de Tango (ID 1633)
by Lobo Loco

Hippie Beatnix - Piano (ID 1654)
by Lobo Loco

Font was retrieved from https://www.1001fonts.com/users/codeman38/

Buzzer sound effect was retrieved from http://www.orangefreesounds.com/

Casino Ambiance was retrieved from "Casino Sound Effect" uploaded to the YouTube channel "Free Audio Zone"

Most of the sprites were retrieved from Kenney.nl
